channel.title: Rain on Jiufeng
channel.description: Recent content in Rain on Jiufeng

item.title: Rainy days
item.author: lijiufeng97@gmail.com (Jiufeng Li)
item.description: Before this summer ends, I hope to go camping in the rain with friends. I love rainy days—it feels like time stands still when the rain falls. There’s a peacefulness amidst the noise, a kind of serene joy that’s truly delightful.
